metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: XPath is a major element in the XSLT standard.
content.html: XPath is a major element in the XSLT standard.

content.text: XPath can be used to navigate through elements and attributes in an XML document.
content.html: XPath can be used to navigate through elements and attributes in an XML document.

content.text: XPath uses path expressions to select nodes or node-sets in an XML document.
content.html: XPath uses path expressions to select nodes or node-sets in an XML document.

content.text: These path expressions look very much like the path expressions you use with traditional computer file systems:
content.html: These path expressions look very much like the path expressions you use with traditional computer file systems:

content.text: There are functions for string values, numeric values, booleans, date and time comparison, node manipulation, sequence manipulation, and much more.
content.html: There are functions for string values, numeric values, booleans, date and time comparison, node manipulation, sequence manipulation, and much more.

content.text: Today XPath expressions can also be used in JavaScript, Java, XML Schema, PHP, Python, C and C++, and lots of other languages.
content.html: Today XPath expressions can also be used in JavaScript, Java, XML Schema, PHP, Python, C and C++, and lots of other languages.

content.text: XPath is a major element in the XSLT standard.
content.html: XPath is a major element in the XSLT standard.

content.text: With XPath knowledge you will be able to take great advantage of your XSLT knowledge.
content.html: With XPath knowledge you will be able to take great advantage of your XSLT knowledge.

content.text: XPath 1.0 became a W3C Recommendation on November 16, 1999.
content.html: XPath 1.0 became a W3C Recommendation on November 16, 1999.

content.text: XPath 2.0 became a W3C Recommendation on January 23, 2007.
content.html: XPath 2.0 became a W3C Recommendation on January 23, 2007.

content.text: XPath 3.0 became a W3C Recommendation on April 8, 2014.
content.html: XPath 3.0 became a W3C Recommendation on April 8, 2014.
